definition[0]: to write something on paper, especially in a neat and clear way, including all the necessary details
example[0]: The children were asked to choose their favourite poem and write it out in their best handwriting.
definition[1]: to write information on a cheque or a form
example[1]: She calmly wrote out a check for $500 and handed it to Will.
definition[2]: to remove a character from a regular radio or television programme, by making him or her leave or die in the story
example[2]: It was revealed last week that Alma is being written out of the series.
